name: unmalicious
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not malicious (= intending or intended to harm or upset other people): She seems like an agreeable, unmalicious person. It's wrong to label the whole of social media as evil but, equally, it is a difficult place for the unmalicious exchange of views. He had a kind, unmalicious smile on his face which distracted me from what he was saying.
More examplesFewer examplesShe is one of the most genuinely unmalicious people you could hope to meet.The joke was meant to be unmalicious but that's not what his father thought.It was a foolish, unmalicious act rather than anything serious.
